noncomputable def section14_triplePairing (p : E [] E [] ) : ( E ) [] ( E ) [] := LinearMap.mk (fun z w => z.1 * w.1 + p z.2.1 w.2.1 + z.2.2 * w.2.2) (by intro z z w simp ring) (by intro c z w simp ring) (by intro z w w simp ring) (by intro c z w simp ring)

Cone-slicing reconstruction for the lifted-epigraph polar (reverse inclusion in Theorem 14.4).
